Reviews.Title: “Great location! What you would expect from a mid range price hotel in NY”
Reviews.Author: vb506
Reviews.Content: stayed vincci 5 nights mid feb rang confirm booking leaving uk due reading reviews previous re booking issues arrival hotel receptionist bit rude unhelpful stood lemons waiting organised issue entire stay clean spacious compared typical ny standards fantastic location 45 nights disruptive sleep due noisy guests etc perfect nights rest guaranteed city sleeps free access internet bonus hotel free tea coffee bit luke warm recommendation hotel overall neat little hotel clean location stay

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME”
Reviews.Author: DAZ5866
Reviews.Content: stayed vincci avalon 28th jan till 2nd feb hotel brilliant massive family worth paying extra hotel staff polite friendly wifi little slow grumble thats free left nice tidy maid service returned evening none stuff touched lots shopping location central penn station commute airport train hotel 17 hotel offer excellent rates private taxi hire hotel hotel price staying

Reviews.Title: “Spacious rooms, great location, really really happy!”
Reviews.Author: ActGirlCanberra
Reviews.Content: enjoyed 7 nights vincci avalon booked 2 juniour suites family delighted amount possibly preferred bit extra space shopping staff lovely helpful situation aircon little warm sorted street cafe 28 grab fabulous meal course plenty diners pizza joints etc enjoy location brilliant near empire building middle manhattan walk wonderful highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: Manresa
Reviews.Content: perfect location beds comfortable bathroom clean enjoyed everytime ny hotel didnt service ladys morning loud service elevator sometimes shouted sang annoying awoke resting day pillows towels ive time recommend

HotelInfo.Name: Avalon
HotelInfo.Address: 16 East 32nd Street, New York City, NY 10016
